grid.title: Itens contados de :DTINI atÃ© :DTFIM
grid.expression: SELECT DISTINCT PRO.CODPROD AS CODIGO, (RTRIM(PRO.DESCRPROD)+' '+ISNULL(PRO.COMPLDESC,'')) AS NOME, PRO.CODVOL AS UNIDADE, PRO.MARCA, (CAST(DAY(EST.AD_DTULTCONT) AS VARCHAR)+'/'+CAST(MONTH(EST.AD_DTULTCONT) AS VARCHAR)+'/'+CAST(YEAR(EST.AD_DTULTCONT) AS VARCHAR)) AS DATA_CONTAGEM, sankhya.FN_ESTOQUE_INOVACAO_NOVO(PRO.CODPROD) AS SALDO FROM sankhya.TGFPRO PRO WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFEST EST WITH (NOLOCK) ON (EST.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD) WHERE EST.AD_DTULTCONT BETWEEN :DTINI AND :DTFIM
